---
title: Sermons
---

# Sermons Theme Layout

The sermons theme layout displays all the sermons for your church and can also include a latest sermon section, a sermon series section, and a livestream section.

## Import the Sermons Theme Layout

As we continue to develop Digital Church, we are updating our theme layouts regularly. In order to have the latest theme layout, however, you will need to manually import the theme layout into your website. You can download the latest theme layout below:

<a target="_blank" href={ require("/downloads/theme-layout-sermons.zip").default } download>Download the Sermons Theme Layout</a>

## Import the Recent Sermons Post Module Settings

If you'd like to just update the posts module that lists the recent sermons, you can import the following code using the page builder.

1. Open the page builder and select the sermons module.
2. Visit the Advanced tab of the module settings and scroll down to the Import/Export section.
3. Paste the following code into the Import field click on the Import button.
